choices: The teacher gives you to one of the other students.

1.content:
Kieran stood at the front of the classroom, atop the teacher's desk.

"Why don't you tell us a bit about yourself" says Mrs. Brown.

Kieran gulped nervously. He could feel the eyes of everybody watching him. They were gigantic compared to him, utter goddesses. Their looks consisted of curiosity, wonder, disgust, awe and excitement. He felt weak and vulnerable. He didn't want to come here. He had begged his mother to allow him to stay home-schooled, but she insisted that it would allow him to finally have a social life and meet new people. He was so nervous.

"H-Hello. My name is K-Kieran McLoughlin. I-I was born w-with a c-c-condition that made me o-only t-t-two inches t-t-tall" he said, shyly. "I-I hope to b-b-be good f-f-friends" he added.

"Very good, Kieran" said Mrs. Brown. "Now..."

However, Kieran was still scared, due to her massive size compared to him. The teacher began the lesson and Heather turned her attention towards her new little friend.

"Hey there, little Kieran" she cooed quietly, smiling down at him. To her, he looked like the most adorable thing she'd ever seen. "Don't be scared, I won't hurt you. You're far too adorable for anyone to hurt you".

Kieran blushed, feeling slightly comforted.

info.brief_description: A tiny man is forced to go to an all-girl school. What could go wrong?
info.description:
Summary
Your name is Kieran McLoughlin. A 17 year old man with a rare birth condition that caused him to be only two inches in height. His parents forced him to go to an all-girl school, under the pretense that girls wouldn't be as rough as guys would.

Rules
1. No male giants.
2. No futas.
3. No furries.
4. No growing, expansion, transformation or anything like that.
5. Keep it in third person.
6. No other tinies.
7. No bad grammar.
8. Don't kill off Kieran unless you plan to end the story there. No changing tinies.
9. No scat/piss.
10. No excessive farting. Smells are okay, but nothing too over the top.

Guidelines
Kieran is a young, socially awkward teenager who's been homeschooled for most of his life. He doesn't really know how to talk to people, let alone girls. Please try to stay in-continuity with that fact. Thank you!
info.pretty_title: Tiny in an All-Girls School (PLEASE ADD)
